熂熂熂

熂字的基本解释

熂
xì
放火焚烧（野草）：“熂山封水，保为家利。”

熂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》許既切，去未，曉。］
火烧杂草。参见“熂燎”。

熂字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页678第36
【廣韻】【集韻】?許旣切，音餼。【玉篇】燎除旁草也。【廣韻】燹火也。【詩·大雅·旱麓箋】柞棫之所以茂盛者乃，人熂燎其旁草，養治之使無害也。【釋文】芟草燒之曰熂。許氣反。又虛刈反。　又【集韻】許竭切，音猲。火焚山草也。

熂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
熂字的起名意思

暂无。

Stew
Basic explanation of words
Stew
xì
Set fire to (wild grass): "The mountain is closed for water to protect the family."
Stew
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, Quwei, Xiao. ]
The fire burns the weeds. See "熂熂玎".
Stew
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熂; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 678 Page 36
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Xu Yanqie, sound. [Jade articles] Singe off the side grass. [Guang Yun] Suo Huo also. 【Poetry·Daya·Hanlu】The reason why Tussah flourishes is that people suffocate the grass next to it, and it is harmless to nourish and treat it. 【Explanation】The burning of straw is called stew. Xu Qi countered. It was falsely mooted again.　[Jiyun] Xu Liqie, the sound is 猲. Burning mountains and grass also.
Stew
